"i forgot rails of war existed"

"ooh that's sick"
"I wish extended bogeys was out for 1.19.2"
"when i asemble"
"Are you using the newest beta from updates"

"Ohh matt meant unlinked bogeys I've heard about this before but could never reproduce it. Looks like there's just a missing blockstate definition I'll get that patched"
"What is the mod?"

"The problem is space inside of the trains"

"i know a fix to that kinda: uninstall extended bogeys remove all existing bogeys to the world install the mod again and it will work"

"use a forge version under 40.2.0"
